item.title: How can i make the Start Up Point change cords etc. PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

bugra52, you explained it quite well, but I Reece I is probley new at coding. Tell him where to edit it and he might not have this:

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 0000;//0000; teleportToY = 0000;//0000;

in his client.java so give him a segment to search like:

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0;

And explain to him, what the height level is… Like how it determines if your on the 2nd or 1st floor, because mabey he wants to start off on the first or even second floor!

~Rich Dude

Remember we arew trying to teach these new coders how to do this, not just give them all the answers. They need to learn java!

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make the Start Up Point change cords etc. PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 0000;//0000; teleportToY = 0000;//0000;

Put the cords were it says
teleportToX = 0000;//0000;
teleportToY = 0000;//0000;[/
Don’t change heightLevel = 0;
